alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 10:47AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A narrow east to west band of showers with torrential rainfall will impact much of northern Connecticut near the Massachusetts border through 1215 PM EDT... At 1046 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a narrow east to west band of showers with torrential rainfall will impact much of northern Connecticut near the Massachusetts border. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Enfield, Windsor, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Webster, Southbridge, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Windsor Locks, Stafford, Somers, Dudley, Granby, East Windsor, Canton, Southwick, Thompson and Sturbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
